# CFBitVectorCreateCopy(_:_:)

**Function**

Creates an immutable bit vector that is a copy of another bit vector.

## Declaration

```swift
func CFBitVectorCreateCopy(_ allocator: CFAllocator!, _ bv: CFBitVector!) -> CFBitVector!
```

## Parameters

- **allocator**: The allocator to use to allocate memory for the new bit vector. Pass `NULL` or kCFAllocatorDefault to use the current default allocator.
- **bv**: The bit vector to copy.

## Return Value

A new bit vector holding the same bit values as `bv`. Ownership follows the [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/CoreFoundation/Conceptual/CFMemoryMgmt/Concepts/Ownership.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20001148-103029].

## Creating a Bit Vector

- **CFBitVectorCreate(_:_:_:)**: Creates an immutable bit vector from a block of memory.

items.description: Creates an immutable bit vector from a block of memory.
